meanings.definition: Engaging in numerous romantic or sexual relationships with women.
meanings.sent1: He was womanising by dating multiple women at the same time.
meanings.sent2: She accused him of womanising because he was always flirting with different women.
meanings.sent3: His friends teased him for womanising, calling him a ladies' man.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation for womanising spread like wildfire in their small town.
meanings.sent5: The movie depicted a character womanising his way through the city, leaving a trail of broken hearts behind.

meanings.definition: The act of pursuing or seducing women for romantic or sexual purposes.
meanings.sent1: His womanising was well-known in their social circle.
meanings.sent2: The womanising of the main character in the novel led to many plot twists.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a hilarious skit about the antics of womanising bachelors.
meanings.sent4: In the world of marketing, his womanising of customers was legendary.
meanings.sent5: The art exhibit showcased paintings that depicted the allure and dangers of womanising.
